What We Do

Newhouse construction works closely with clients to deliver dream projects on time and on budget.

In every step of a project from design to completion, we are committed to open communication and client satisfaction.

With a combined 40 years of general contracting and construction experience in Montana, you can be assured we will always deliver with the higest standard of craftmanship.

No job is too big or small. We build luxury custom homes, renovations, additions, garages, decks and everything in between.
